DOC.detailed_description: Currently , American Cancer Society recommend physically active lifestyle cancer survivor increase disease-free survival cancer chronic disease , improve quality life . Studies strong benefit physical activity improve QOL follow type cancer treatment , e.g. , breast cancer , well documented literature ; yet study physical activity QOL diagnosis ovarian cancer publish . Therefore , clinical trial exercise common physical psychological consequence ovarian cancer treatment warrant . The primary aim study examine , 230 woman complete treatment Stage I-IV ovarian cancer , impact moderate-intensity aerobic exercise intervention vs. attention control : - Quality Life - Body Composition ( weight , BMI , total % body fat , waist hip circumference ) - Hormones possibly associate physical activity ovarian cancer prognosis ( insulin , IGF-I , IGF-II , IGF bind protein-3 , CRP , leptin , estrone , estradiol , free estradiol , sex-hormone binding globulin , osteopontin , MIF , prolactin , CA-125 ) - Cardiorespiratory Fitness - objective measure functional capacity adherence exercise . Hypotheses : Women randomize exercise experience improvement quality life , body composition , hormone level , cardiorespiratory fitness compare woman randomize usual care . Our trial could suggest unique important role exercise ovarian cancer care give physical functional aspect QOL often compromise ovarian cancer patient .
